This folder contains a *Hello World* example of *Jekyll*.


# Commands

1. Check `jekyll` command

    ```bash
    /opt/homebrew/lib/ruby/gems/3.3.0/bin/jekyll    \
    --version
    ```


3. Build Jekyll site

    ``` shell
    /opt/homebrew/lib/ruby/gems/3.3.0/bin/jekyll    \
    build
    ```


2. Serve Jekyll site

    ``` shell
    /opt/homebrew/lib/ruby/gems/3.3.0/bin/jekyll    \
    serve
    ```
